markdownRemark.html: Situated at the highest part of the Playa de La Barrosa beach, next to the Novo Sancti Petri residential estate, in the municipality of Chiclana de la Frontera. It is a short field of 18 holes but quite technical and fun. The field is very well taken care of. The clubhouse prepares good food and have friendly staff.

frontmatter.title: Sancti Petri Hills Golf
